mapper.select: SELECT home_no,poster,subject,home_level,num FROM (SELECT home_no,poster,subject,home_level,rownum as num FROM (SELECT home_no,poster,subject,home_level FROM hometraining WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no} ORDER BY cate_no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM hometraining WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no}
